detail.i: A very easy used Context management system
Free for personal study and License for commercial use
The UI is based on Bootstrap 3.0
Welcome to contribute your idea to me

welcome.i: The Footer Context Management System v1.0 is made by Steve Cai, Copyright
This is a very ease to use for that any developer want to deploy a CMS(Context Management System) for backend to do the context management.

Why I said it is very ease? Because you just need to modify the configuration for the CMS in your apache service, add the Xml model just to finish the CMS. Everything displayed in this is cms based on Xml. Such as the menu is just need to config the /model/menu.xml, the managed object is need to config the Xml like test.xml or user.xml. You may get a prefect display in the browser. And I keep some interface for you can replace the JS script and other funtion in PHP. Please go to see the /Admin/user.php and /classes/modelmgr/UserXmlModel.cls.php for example.
If you are an experienced developer, I think you can see the Xml and know what I do. Go ahead to contribute your idea to me in GitHub.
